entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
